Hi,

This is a known behavior: it is not possible to call autograd.backward or autograd.grad inside the backward of a Function. It will hang.

I don't think there is an easy solution to fix this at the moment unfortunately @apaszke ?

body:
Hi,

This is a known behavior: it is not possible to call `autograd.backward` or `autograd.grad` inside the `backward` of a Function. It will hang.

I don't think there is an easy solution to fix this at the moment unfortunately @apaszke ?
